companies.description: One-month internship as a web developer on the Lukyna’s e-commerce website. Ergonomy, responsive and SEO improvements.
Permanent contract in the making and sale of home-made burgers every weekends.
Two-month internship as a web developer using AngularJS and Ionic to create a cross-platform mobile game.
Two summers, and every weekends of the year in a restaurant. Indoor and terrace service, and dish cleaning.
Creation of the micro-enterprise MPC. Computer advising and troubleshooting at home.
A month in the USA during which I worked for Rifle Colorado’s City Hall. Website and TV Chanel administration, file management, electronic device set up.
Two-week internship in house renovation and construction.
A week of internship doing computer fixing, troubleshooting and unmounting.

schools.description: Five years of studies in an engineering school specialized in computer sciences.
Scientific High School, specialized in engineering, computer and electronic sciences.

diplomas.description: Similar to A-Level (UK) or High School Diploma (US). Acquired with AB and European mentions.

about.usa_text1: Because I worked a month in Colorado in 2014, the United States quickly became a second home for me.
about.usa_text2: You actually can found the blog of the 16 years old me discovering beauty of america for the first time here (in french) ->
about.usa_text3: I come back there sometimes since then to see my awesome american friends.
about.usa_text4: Last time I came there was in April 2019, you can found some cool picture here ->
about.spain_text: I used to go to Spain since my childhood, it’s somewhere my parents love to go to, and I almost always followed them there. Sun, beautiful cities, nice people, this is what I love to found back when I return to this wonderful country.
about.france_text: Of course I had to put France here, but not only because it is my native country, but because I genuinely think it’s an awesome place to live in. I LOVE to travel all around France, all the cities are different, and all the regions have their own cultures.
about.prez: I am 21 and I am a third-year student in a computer engineering school to become a full-stack developer. I am passionate by new technologies and numeric since my childhood.
about.app-info: This website is still not finished yet. Every data are not hard-coded, they are stocked in JSON objects in order to edit them easily. Made with ❤️ thanks to the awesome VueJS framework.
